resources.string: Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MokoBeacon use the Storage permission
MokoBeacon requires access to Location and Storage permission. If the permissions are not on, MokoBeacon cannot be used normally.
After that, MokoBeacon could search and connect with the iBeacon
Please find it in cellphone setting- permission, and allow MokoBeacon use the Location and Storage permission
After that, MokoBeacon could search and connect with the iBeacon
The device is disconnected. Please click the “CONNECT” on the top to reconnect.
